body.name: 140mm Case Fan Quiet High Performance PC Fan 140mm Standard Case Fan 3pin 4pin Molex Connector 12V DC Computer PC CPU Case Fan 1000RPM 2-Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ❤ STANDARD CASE FAN:140x140x25mm 140mm fan quiet silent 12v dc 0.38A cooling fan for the replacement of standard computer case fan ,gaming PC fan ,CPU cooler fan or other electronics equipment heat sink radiator.the fan's speed can be adjusted by using a different voltage (5-12V), it can work at a lower voltage to achieve a silent effect.
❤ 3-PIN CONNECTOR: 140mm 3 Pin connector fan for easy installation.4pin motherboard power port to suitable for more than 2 kinds of 140mm fan using.
❤ ANTI-VIBRATION SCREWS: Besides 4pcs normal screws there has extra 4pcs anti-vibration silicon screws packed together to reduce noise between fan and PC case.
❤ PACKAGE INCLUDED:140mm long life sleeve bearing case fan x 2 ,Silicone screws x 8, fan screws x 8.
❤ 100% 90 DAY MONEY BACK : If you are not satisfied for any reason, simply return your product for a full refund, no questions asked. You have nothing to lose.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dimention:140*140*25mm Current and Voltage:0.38A/12V Noise:25 dBA Pressure: 11.39(mmaq) 0.45(In H2O) Cable Length:300mm Fan Speed: 1000RPM+-10% Extend the Electronics Life and Make it working longer: Normally, When electronics Stop working,The Main Problem is the Main Board, Use the Heatsink Cooling fan is not only for the Cooling but also Extend its life.Make your electronics working longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: dude, this is silent, and quite good at cooling.you know how when you touch metal and its specific heat capacity is lower than your hand? well, this baby is freezing. at work, before they gave me a heater, id run intensive simulations, just for heat. here? now? i have to buy a personal heater for my apartment, or at least turn off the A/C. talk about inconvenient!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These fans are fairly quiet and move a decent amount of air, considering the price. A good value option, you won't regret purchasing these if looking for decent budget alternatives to some of the highest-regarded offerings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded My Expectations
reviews.reviewText: I'll admit upfront, I would have never ordered these for one of my personal builds, but in this case I was building my nephew a low powered Intel 7th gen rig for his birthday. I was trying to spend as little as possible while still providing him a pleasurable gaming/computing experience. These met my needs. They look and feel cheap. I wouldn't recommend them if they are going to be in a situation where they are being handled or installed and uninstalled regularly, but if you are just going to slap them in a low end build and leave them alone, they are perfect. They move plenty of air if you are using them in a lower powered build like I did and you really can't even hear them run at idle speeds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars is it worth it
reviews.reviewText: purchased 2 of these. i always keep a spare and so far it is working good. no noise and doing the job. so far worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price but noisy.
reviews.reviewText: They are quite noisy, but they are good for the price and airflow, so it’s up to your needs and preferences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PC Enthusiast Stamp of Approval
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure what all the negative reviews on these are about, but I'm very satisfied with them. I run a very high end gaming system (Ryzen 9 3900X, RTX 2080ti, 32GB DDR4 3600Mhz). I bought these fans because my PC was running very hot with the CPU reaching temps of 90 degrees celsius and my GPU hitting the max temp I allow in my profile at 84 degrees no matter what game I was playing. The case previously only had one fan on the back with two empty fan spaces at the top of the case (not including the 3 fans mounted to the AIO radiator). It was scary hot. I installed these fans in a pull configuration on the top of my case (pulling air out of the case) and my temps dropped by 25-30 degrees in all previously mentioned areas. Not only that, the different connectors they come with make them compatible with pretty much any system. They are also dead quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really EXCELLENT 140mm Fans!
reviews.reviewText: I Installed 4 of these 140mm fans, in my system, 2 as intakes, 2 as exhaust. I needed great airflow, not fancy lights, and these work great, for me.Keep in mind, they actually have very little clearance to the mounting surface (which is great).They are quiet, and paired with 2 other120mm intake and exhaust fans, provide excellent airflow, in my setup.Case: Cooler Master Centurion 590 Mid ATX.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for venting Rv fridge.
reviews.reviewText: I installed 2 at the bottom of refer for intake and 2 on top for exhaust flow. Put on a thermostat for 85 degrees on and off. Makes a big difference with minimal draw.
Very nice. Only one thing....No instructions. Why 3 wires and two plugs ? Otherwise they working and they are like expected. Thanks.

Does what it says, not much to say. The only thing is if you want to hook them up in series you have to use the connector that only has 2 leads in it. I believe the 3rd (yellow) lead is for speed control. So you can hook one up with the 3 lead connector to the motherboard but if you are out of case fan ports (which I was) you have to get power from the first fan and then you can only use the 2 lead connector. So the second fan's speed will be static.
Aucun problème à installer et très silencieuse

reviews.reviewTitle: They are very quiet because they spin at a low speed
reviews.reviewText: Not suitable for direct cooling of computer components. Excellent for indirect computer case cooling. Max rpm is 1000 vs 1500 to1800 rpm for other computer fans.I am using mine to provide cooling to a custom-built DIY hydroponic LED grow light fixture.
Quality made. Low noise. Would buy again.
